      • getLocalMember

        public Member getLocalMember()
        Returns the local member of this cluster. The local member is the actual process running on this host. The remote members are proxies of members running on other hosts.
        Returns:
        non-null local member.

      • forceLeader

        public void forceLeader(int timeout)
        Forces the local member of this cluster to become the leader. Blocks until this member becomes the leader.
        Parameters:
        timeout - -1 means there is no timeout.

      • checkoutCommand

        public Command checkoutCommand()
                        throws InterruptedException

        Returns:

      • getCommittedCommand

        public Command getCommittedCommand(int index)
                            throws Exception
        Equivalent to getCommittedCommand(index, -1);
        Parameters:
        index - must be > 0.
        Returns:
        the non-null Command at index.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getCommittedCommand

        public Command getCommittedCommand(int index,
                                   int timeout)
                            throws Exception
        Returns the command at the specified index. This method blocks until index has been committed. An empty command can be returned. This is an artifact of the raft protocol to avoid deadlock when used with a finite thread pool. Empty commands will be inserted right after a leader election when the new leader discovers that it has uncommitted commands. The leader inserts an empty command to commit these immediately.
        Parameters:
        index - Must be > 0.
        timeout - Returns after timeout milliseconds, even if the command is not yet available. -1 means there is no timeout.
        Returns:
        non-null Command
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getCommitIndex

        public int getCommitIndex()
        Returns commitIndex.
